nodes.description: 2018年7月7日，Al-Shabaab袭击摩加迪沙的 interior 和 security ministries 的 compound
nodes.support_text: The July 2018 Mogadishu bombings took place on July 7, 2018 when fighters of the Somali group Al-Shabaab attacked the compound of Somalia's interior and security ministries in the center of Mogadishu.

nodes.description: 恐怖分子在 interior 部门大楼的主要入口处引爆了两辆汽车炸弹
nodes.support_text: fighters detonated two car bombs outside the main gate of the interior ministry building

nodes.description: 三名激进分子随后冲入大楼
安全部队击毙了所有三名枪手，造成至少20人死亡，多人受伤
nodes.support_text: all three gunmen were killed by the security forces

edges.support_text: when fighters of the Somali group Al-Shabaab attacked the compound
and all three gunmen were killed by the security forces
